name: Déjà Vu Build- 4/5/21
description:
PLAY OUR MOST RECENT BUILD!!!

This build of Déjà Vu  represents a more developed state of the game as of 4/5/21. Further creation of better atmospheric lighting, ambient audio, and new environmental areas exist within this build. The level design still reflects the linear narrative driven nature of the game, but now with more polished mechanics and deliberate narrative beats to give more context to the game. Get a much better feel for the more updated state of the game in this demo, which is far from perfect, but a project well on its way.
